item.title: My First Post
item.description: Approach & Mindset The golden circle What is the why, how, and what of the UX Design practice? Why we do what we do: We envision a world where everybody who uses the products and services we create or improve gets what they need and enjoys doing it. How we do it: We take a human-centered approach to design. That means we seek to deeply understand the people weâ€™re designing for by talking to them and observing what they do and keeping them at the center of the creation process.
